description:
The interview was recorded on September 20, 2003 with ʻĪd Abū Huḍayb, male, born in 1917 in Baṣṣat al-Fāliq, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع عيد أبو هضيب في 20 أيلول سبتمبر عام 2003، ذكر، ولد عام 1917 في بصّة الفالق، فلسطين.
contents: Childhood and socio-economic conditions during the British Mandate. (@ 0:00)||Socio-economic conditions and trade . (@ 19:37)||Social and cultural life at Baṣṣat al-Fāliq . (@ 24:44)||Socio-political life at Baṣṣat al-Fāliq under the British rule. (@ 47:40)||Economic hardships and resistance. (@ 63:5)||Expulsion and refugee experience. (@ 83:6)||Final reflections . (@ 102:42)
